attributes.action: Keep Boris Johnson as Prime minister, let him deliver brexit.
attributes.background: With all the uncertainty around Brexit at the moment, the people of the United Kingdom need a straight forward answer and someone to deliver, Boris Johnson promises to take us out of the EU, let him deliver what he promised and let’s get the country back on a straight road.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
In any case, we can't accept petitions about honours and appointments, including the appointment of the Prime Minister.
